mapper.select: select books.bnum,books.btitle,books.bprice,books.bpoint,books.bshipinfo,books.bcount stored,cart.mnum,cart.bcount,img.imgsavefilename from (select * from books)books,(select * from cart where mnum=#{mnum})cart,(select * from img where thumbnail=1 and btype=1)img where books.bnum=cart.bnum and cart.bnum=img.bnum
